snippet: A North Carolina prisoner, described as a high-ranking gang member, was charged with arranging the abduction of a prosecutor’s father via an illicit mobile phone.
abstract: Kelvin Melton, North Carolina inmate described as high-ranking gang member, faces federal kidnapping charge after he allegedly used an illicit mobile phone to arrange the abduction of a prosecutor's father.
lead_paragraph: A North Carolina prisoner, described as a high-ranking gang member, was charged with arranging the abduction of a prosecutor’s father via an illicit mobile phone.

headline.main: Inmate Is Accused of Organizing a Kidnapping
headline.print_headline: Inmate Is Accused of Organizing a Kidnapping
